adjectives.description: afterwitted (comparative more afterwitted, superlative most afterwitted)

examples: Our fashions of eating make us slothful, and unlusty to labour and study; unstable, inconstant, and light-mannered; full of wits, after-witted (as we call it), incircumspect, inconsiderate, heady, rash, and hasty to begin unadvisedly
